description: Access to Seacat Admin API and UI.
Grants superuser access, including the access to all tenants.
Open a session as a different user.
Grants non-superuser access to all tenants.
List credentials and view credentials details.
List sessions and view session details.
List resources and view resource details.
List clients and view client details.
List tenants, view tenant detail and see tenant members.
Search tenant roles, view role detail and list role bearers.
Create, edit and delete tenant roles. This does not enable the bearer to assign Seacat system resources.
